idf_component_register(
    SRCS "http_server.c"
    INCLUDE_DIRS "include"
    PRIV_INCLUDE_DIRS "../webserver"
    REQUIRES esp_http_server json nvs_flash mbedtls network qrcode peer_manager p2p audit vfs esp_timer wifi esp_wifi esp_system esp_netif esp_event chat_storage
)

# Web UI is now served from gzipped C header files (components/webserver/www/*.gz.h)
# Generated by: cd www && npm run deploy
